attributes.action: ReIntroduction of Legal Aid instead of no win no fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are hundreds or claims companies offering compensation services but only if your case has a 51% chance of success, (No Fee, No Win) for accidents (road, work etc.)  Paul Rooney Solicitors is one of the examples i will use as an experience.  I recently had a accident in work and contact the above, who took basic details from me then after months of chasing them to see if they were pursuing the case against a local council, i was told they couldn't because they said i would only have have a 50% chance of winning the case and as there policy is that it needs to be at least 51% that was that.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
